evidence.text: This Court granted plaintiff American Foreign Service Association’s (“AFSA”) motion for a preliminary injunction and enjoined defendants from implementing Section 3 of Executive Order 14251.
The defendants have appealed that order and request that this Court stay its order pending the appeal.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: This lawsuit seeks to set aside and enjoin this ultra vires action because the scope of the termination of collective bargaining rights is not authorized by the Foreign Service Labor-Management Relations Statute
